mainText:
My heart and thoughts go out to his family and friends. I have followed
Apple for a long time. Apple is not just a brand. Apple is not just a
software or a gadget. Apple is the glue that brought and will continue to
bring people from all walks of life together. Steve Jobs is Apple and Apple
will always be Steve Jobs.  While we lost a special human being we have
gained a spirit of hope and love for all things. He will be missed.
author: Matthew
